duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop creative, cost-effective, and structurally sound packaging solutions
Create proof of concept prototypes for existing products, new launches, and line extensions
Provide technical support to sales, customer service, and production teams
Create multi-out drawings to maximize production efficiencies
Stay current on industry trends and material-related research
Stay current with software updates, industry standards, and technology developments

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Graphic or Industrial Design (Master's Preferred)
4-6 years of structural/industrial package design experience
